name: Herodot Calendar
short_description: Using Prototype by prototypejs.org, inspirations from tinyMCE and code pieces from spiffyCal create a JavaScript control which used to be a calendar easy to use, free configurable and work in all browsers which support at least prototype 1.5.0.
